languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} маршала встать на свою сторону, воззвав к его совести.
Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} маршала встать на свою сторону, воззвав к его совести.

traits.locale_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.
Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.

languages.text: Has convencido al Mariscal de que se una a tu bando apelando a su conciencia.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.

traits.locale_text: Has convencido al Mariscal de que se una a tu bando apelando a su conciencia.

languages.text: 你呼吁元帅遵从良知的选择，说服了他加入你的阵营。
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.

traits.locale_text: 你呼吁元帅遵从良知的选择，说服了他加入你的阵营。

languages.text: 将帥を味方に引き込むために良心に訴えた。
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.

traits.locale_text: 将帥を味方に引き込むために良心に訴えた。

languages.text: Den Marschall durch Appellieren an sein Gewissen überzeugt, sich auf deine Seite zu schlagen.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.

traits.locale_text: Den Marschall durch Appellieren an sein Gewissen überzeugt, sich auf deine Seite zu schlagen.

languages.text: Vicdanına hitap ederek Miralay'ı kendi tarafına geçmeye ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.

traits.locale_text: Vicdanına hitap ederek Miralay'ı kendi tarafına geçmeye ikna ettin.

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu le maréchal de se rallier à vous en appelant à sa conscience.
languages.original_text: Convinced the Marshal to join your side by appealing to his conscience.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu le maréchal de se rallier à vous en appelant à sa conscience.
